member.name: NUMA_NODE_RELATIONSHIP
member.summary: Represents information about a NUMA node in a processor group. This structure is used with the function.

member.name: NUMA_NODE_RELATIONSHIP.NodeNumber
member.summary: The number of the NUMA node.

member.name: NUMA_NODE_RELATIONSHIP.GroupCount
member.summary: The number of groups included in the GroupMasks array. This field was introduced in TBD Release Iron. On earlier versions, this value is always 0.

member.name: NUMA_NODE_RELATIONSHIP.DUMMYUNIONNAME.GroupMask
member.summary: A structure that specifies a group number and processor affinity within the group.

member.name: NUMA_NODE_RELATIONSHIP.DUMMYUNIONNAME.GroupMasks
member.summary: An array of structure that specifies a group number and processor affinity within the group.
